definition: in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: I just hadn't realised how endangered the community was and this whole culture could simply die, disappear.
sentences.chinese: 我不曾意識到這個羣落危在旦夕，整個文化都會消亡。

sentences.english: There were three lives at stake versus one.
sentences.chinese: 有三條生命危在旦夕，三比一。

definition: precarious as pile of eggs (idiom); ready to fall and break at any moment/in a dangerous state
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve

vitally important/a matter of life and death
